skills.name: FESTERING CUT
desc: • Deal true damage to a single target.
• Inflict Perfect Heal Block for 3 turns.
• Grant Regen to self and a random ally for 3 turns.
• Gain Charge for 2 turns if Ghost is present on self.

skills.name: SEVER HOPE
desc: • Deals 2 hits of true damage to a single target.
• Remove Curse and Perfect Corruption effects from allies.
• Inflict Perfect Corruption and Stop to the target for 3 turns.
• Gain an Extra Turn if Ghost is present on self.

skills.name: ZEALOUS CHANT
desc: Remove Silver Effects from self every turn. Heal allies for 5% Max HP for every 20% of your Missing HP every turn. Remove Golden Effects, minus Shroud, Perfect Immortality, and Soul Protect, and apply Perfect Corruption to all enemies for 2 turns on death. Cleanse and grant Perfect Heal Shield to all allies for 2 turns on death.
